code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Login from'./Login';import Dashboard from'./Dashboard';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[token,setToken]=useState(localStorage.getItem('token'));const handleLogin=newToken=>{localStorage.setItem('token',newToken);setToken(newToken);};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');setToken(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/logo.png",alt:"Diamond Basketball Officials",className:"logo"}),token?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{token:token,onLogout:handleLogout}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLogin:handleLogin})]});}export default App;
